Add secure backend and remove client secret from frontend

Add endpoint to get profile work history and colleagues from all companies
Limit colleague matching to current + 1 previous company only

Update OAuth callback to create user, match to Bright Data profile, and enable review flow
Update frontend to use real APIs for review flow
Fix OAuth matching: extract profile_id from LinkedIn URL, fallback to linkedin_num_id and name
Fix Profile page to use real LinkedIn OAuth user data instead of mock data
Add detailed OAuth logging to debug profile matching
Implement image matching: extract image ID from LinkedIn OAuth picture and match to Bright Data avatar URLs

Register admin routes in server.js

Add profile picture to Onboarding page and skip counter to Insufficient Interaction button

Add loading state to skip button and fix counter jumping issue
Update Onboarding: wider card, user name greeting, bigger anonymous icon, replace all arrows with new design
Add new images: anonymous icon and right arrow
Fix colleague query to prioritize current and most recent shared companies
Add daily skip budget refresh: sessions expire after 24 hours, button shows 'Try again tomorrow' when skips exhausted
Add abuse detection: block users who exhaust skips 3 days in a row, cap max skips at 3/day, add Blocked page with contact form
Fix skip budget: company-size-based (3-13 max), +3 daily refresh only when exhausted
Fix database column name: use started_at instead of created_at for review_sessions
Enforce blocking: redirect blocked users to Blocked page immediately, prevent access to other pages
Add score fetching from backend API to display user reviews and scores on Profile page
Clean up Profile page: remove clock icon, hide Reviews Received when 0, remove duplicate button
Fix mobile OAuth CSRF error: switch from sessionStorage to localStorage with 10min expiration
Improve colleague matching: better handling for duration-only profiles (assume 24mo overlap for current employees)
Add skip tracking: profiles get 2nd chance after 1st skip, excluded after 2nd skip (per user)
Fix: Remove is_blocked column reference (not in schema yet)
Restore is_blocked abuse detection + Add migration
Fix mobile OAuth: Use sessionStorage + localStorage fallback
Optimize mobile OAuth + Add user-facing message

Add comprehensive data field audit documentation

Improve navigation and profile visibility

Add randomization and prioritize colleagues with 1-2 reviews for completion

Upgrade to GPT-4o-mini for better grammar correction with lower temperature
